I’m a research fellow working jointly at the Center for Computational Neuroscience (CCN) and the Center for Computational Mathematics (CCM). I completed my Ph.D. at the Center for Data Science (CDS) at New York University (NYU). I hold a bachelor’s degree in Solid-State Physics and a master’s degree in Psychology.
